description: Numbers represented by quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 3, 1; 1, 8 ].
comments: Nonnegative integers of the form 3*x^2 + 2*x*y + 8*y^2, discriminant -92.
links: N. J. A. Sloane et al., Binary Quadratic Forms and OEIS (Index to related sequences, programs, references)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
